headline.main: LANG OFFERS ALIBI IN BOMBSIGHT SALE; Defendant in Spy Trial Says He Was in Bavaria, Not Berlin, at Time Named

lead_paragraph: Herman Lang, one of the defendants in the Brooklyn espionage trial, testified yesterday that at the time he is charged with delivering vital secrets of the famous Norden bombsight to Nazi aviation officials in Berlin, he was working on a farm in Northern Bavaria, "collecting mushrooms and chopping wood."
abstract: Lang explains alleged cooperation with Sebold; denies bombsight details sale to Germany
